tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE citizenship_exam_questions (
  question_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  question_text TEXT NOT NULL,
  correct_answer TEXT NOT NULL,
  difficulty_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE Citizenship_Exam_Questions (
  question_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  question_text TEXT,
  correct_answer TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Citizenship_Exam_Answers (
  answer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  answer_text TEXT,
  is_correct BOOLEAN,
  question_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE Citizenship_Exam_Topics (
  topic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  topic_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Citizenship_Exam_Results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_name TEXT,
  score INT,
  exam_date DATE
)
